entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
